repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
This is a manuscript of Jaiminibhārata. The published edition of Jaiminibhārata by Geeta press Gorakhapur has note that the only pavan available of the Jaiminibhārata is Aśvamedhika pavan and Aufrecht Catalogus (p 1-208) also mention manuscripts only of Aśvamedhika pavan but this manuscript is of āśramavāsa parvan which is followed by the Aśvamedhika parvan in the mahābhārata chapters. NCC [vol. 7 pp; 310-311] mentions as Sītāvijaya from Aśvamedhika / āśramavāsa parva.
Note on the front cover : Jaiminibhārata: ĀSramavāsika parva. Injured towards the end .. Granth By Jaimini 123 9

msItem.title: Jaiminibhārata: Āshramavasika
msItem.author: Jaimini
msItem.incipit: 1v1 a (2 letters broken) tmānyākāraṃ purastāt kubjarā[jānaṃ] (gap of 2 letters due to half broken and damaged folio) stāśeza ….
msItem.explicit: xv 6 Srayaṃ . jaimuniḥ . sītāvijayamākarṇya sa dhṛtarāṣṭrasya bhupateḥ . paralokāpitaparyantaṃ yadvṛttaṃ nyavasa?m (8-9 syllables are illegible due to damaged ṛolio.)

support.p: wooden guard folio as a support.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin but folio numbers are mostly lost due to damaged margins.
supportDesc.condition: Condition delicate. Folio numbers are lost due to damaged margins.

handNote.desc: hasty handwriting. Some clusters are mixed with other line that it is difficult to read at some palces.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ Vande gurūbhya Śubhamastu .. is written in the left margin on 1v.

listBibl.bibl: Śrī Jaiminīya Aśvamedha Parva, Sanskrit with Hindi translation Gita Press, Gorakhpur 1995, available on archive org.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.

TEI.text:
1v1 a (2 letters broken) tmānyākāraṃ purastāt kubjarā[jānaṃ] (gap of 2 letters due to half broken and damaged folio) stāśeza ….
6v 6 sra mukharā (2 letters broken) . durvāsāśramamāsādya [gā]trabhissahitoryyaḥ . praṇamya pita ram bhaktyā namastepe sudhāśrīṇaṃ . iti jaimunībhārate āśramavāsaparvaṇī sītāvijayo 6v 7 catur[thodhyā]yaḥ .. jaimuniḥ himavantamupāgamya sahasravadanastadā …
xv 6 Srayaṃ . jaimuniḥ . sītāvijayamākarṇya sa dhṛtarāṣṭrasya bhupateḥ . paralokāpitaparyantaṃ yadvṛttaṃ nyavasa?m (8-9 syllables are illegible due to damaged ṛolio.) xv 7 Iti jaimunibhārate āśramavāsaparvaṇi sītāvijayo
